name: The Walk (itch) (Voltage)
description:
The walk is a short horror game I made as my very first every game. Join the discord at discord.gg/yV3yHezTPD to be notified for upcoming updates and to make a bug report! Also donations are not required but are greatly appreciated! AFTER VERSION 1.1.1 YOU DO NOT HAVE TO RE-INSTALL THE GAME IT HAS AN AUTO UPDATER. Every time there is a new release for the game you don't have to re-download the installer, its the same file just re-named so you know what version it is. Just run the game and it should check for updates and update you to the latest version. #horror #3d

v.1.1.2 of the walk released

fixed footsteps sound bug

added resolution and graphics quality dropdown

minor changes and improvements

v1.1.1

fixed menu text in wonky position

added auto updater

other minor changes

v1.1.0 of the walk is out

changes: menu overhaul

volume slider fix

more volume sliders

fixed jumpscare animation

fixed jumpscare animation script

other minor changes
